paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information and penetrance data from the study.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In one of the two OC patients with discordant results, the c.1813delA PV, located at a homopolymeric region of BRCA2, was not detected by the Oncomine variant calling software.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a deletion that leads to a frameshift and is associated with ovarian cancer.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was confirmed through manual curation analysis.
key_quotes: In one of the two OC patients with discordant results, the c.1813delA PV, located at a homopolymeric region of BRCA2, was not detected by the Oncomine variant calling software.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the other patient, bearing the germline BRCA2 c.4284dupT p.(Gln1429Serfs*9) variant, tumour testing on relapsing OC tissue showed the large BRCA2 deletion p.(Leu1334_Asn1742del) encompassing the germline variant.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a duplication that leads to a frameshift and is associated with ovarian cancer.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was associated with clinical progression upon treatment.
key_quotes: In the other patient, bearing the germline BRCA2 c.4284dupT p.(Gln1429Serfs*9) variant, tumour testing on relapsing OC tissue showed the large BRCA2 deletion p.(Leu1334_Asn1742del) encompassing the germline variant.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
